title: 3rd sem cse professors
content:
can someone please tell me how these teachers are and the do's and don'ts to be aware of in their class?
thank you.

comments.body: Hey where did you find this
Is that who I think it is as your DSA prof? 💀
The man, the myth, the legend
Wait JSP still teaches ??? Damn, Op tell us ur experience when classes start 😁
Honestly I've never seen him take *any* course so I don't know 😭
Atleast OP will now get first row seats to the latest management gossip
you got a goated prof for ddco
PAC is good for Web Tech.

after 3 weeks of having his classes every wednesday for 1.5 hours i can say that he can teach well but not to a bigger audience. he goes slow and we are gonna have a lot of extra classes to complete the syllabus 😭
she can't teach a class but if you go to her personally she explains well😭
